objects.description: [InvisibleFerret](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1245) has searched the victim device credentials and files commonly associated with cryptocurrency wallets.(Citation: Esentire ContagiousInterview BeaverTail InvisibleFerret November 2024)(Citation: ESET Contagious Interview BeaverTail InvisibleFerret February 2025)(Citation: Zscaler ContagiousInterview BeaverTail InvisibleFerret November 2024)(Citation: PaloAlto ContagiousInterview BeaverTail InvisibleFerret November 2023)
